import React from "react"; import { Book } from "./select-box-type/book"; import { DVD } from "./select-box-type/dvd"; import { Furniture } from "./select-box-type/furniture"; export const AddForm = ({handleDropdownChange,selectValue,handleSubmit})=>{ return
{handleSubmit(e)}}>
{selectValue === "Book" &&
What is the Weight of the book in kg?
} {selectValue === "DVD" &&
Please provide the information of the DVD capacity
} {selectValue === "Furniture" &&
Please provide the Height of the Furniture in cm
Please provide the width of the Furniture in cm
Please provide the Length of the Furniture in cm
}
}
